1.3.name: wordpress/hover-image
1.3.description:
WARNING FOR VERSION 1.4 USERS: PLEASE UPDATE TO THE LATEST VERSION!

Hover Image makes you able to add hover-images to your WordPress Posts and Pages. Simply use the shortcode [himage] [/himage] and place two images inside. The first image can be hyperlink, this will be used for the "himage" too.

If you like Hover Image and wanr to use it in your language, feel free to contact me to create translations! Thanks
